translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: dbu ma'i don bsdus pa /
analyzed: dbu ma'i don bsdus pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the glorious Samantabhadra.

original: gang dag skye med rtogs pa nyid yin yang //
analyzed: gang dag skye med rtogs pa nyid yin yang //
translated: Although they have realized non-arising,

original: tha snyad do gang snying rjes 'khor ba ma stongs par //
analyzed: tha snyad do gang snying rjes 'khor ba ma stongs par //
translated: Through compassion, they do not empty sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: rgyal ba rnams ni 'jig rten bde bar bskyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams ni 'jig rten bde bar bskyab pa'i phyir //
translated: The victors remain in the world to protect beings with happiness.

original: 'di ru bzhugs kyang dri med blo dang ldan //
analyzed: 'di ru bzhugs kyang dri med blo dang ldan //
translated: Even though they are present here, they possess stainless minds.

original: de dag rnams la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal //üîΩbden pa gnyis ni ji lta bu'i //
analyzed: de dag rnams la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal // bden pa gnyis ni ji lta bu'i //
translated: I constantly pay homage to them.üîΩIn order to understand

original: don ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: don ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: The meaning of the two truths,

original: bdag gis 'di ni rab brtsams te //
analyzed: bdag gis 'di ni rab brtsams te //
translated: I have composed this.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
translated: The Dharma taught by the buddhas

original: bden pa gnyis su 'dus pa ste //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su 'dus pa ste //
translated: Is subsumed within the two truths:

original: don dam dang ni kun rdzob po //
analyzed: don dam dang ni kun rdzob po //
translated: The ultimate and the conventional.

original: dam pa'i don ni spros bral te //
analyzed: dam pa'i don ni spros bral te //
translated: The ultimate truth is free from elaborations,

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bya //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis su bya //
translated: And it is twofold.

original: rnam grangs kyi ni don dam dang // rnam grangs ma yin don dam mo //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi ni don dam dang // rnam grangs ma yin don dam mo //
translated: And the uncategorized ultimate.

original: dang po de yang gnyis yin te //
analyzed: dang po de yang gnyis yin te //
translated: The first is also twofold:üîΩThe categorized ultimate of reasoning

original: rigs pa rnam grangs don dam dang // skye ba bkag pa'i don dam mo //üîΩmu pa ni  skye 'gog la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rigs pa rnam grangs don dam dang // skye ba bkag pa'i don dam mo // mu pa ni  skye 'gog la sogs pa'i //
translated: And the ultimate that refutes arising.üîΩThe former is easy to understand

original: gtan tshigs bzhi yi rigs pa bde //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bzhi yi rigs pa bde //
translated: Through the four reasonings, such as the absence of arising.

original: snang ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang //
analyzed: snang ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang //
translated: All appearing things

original: skye ba bkag pa'i don dam mo //
analyzed: skye ba bkag pa'i don dam mo //
translated: Are the ultimate that refutes arising.

original: spros pa thams cad kyis stong pa //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad kyis stong pa //
translated: The emptiness of all elaborations

original: de ni rnam grangs ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: de ni rnam grangs ma yin pa'i //
translated: Is the uncategorized ultimate.üîΩIt should be understood to be

original: dam pa'i don du shes par bya //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du shes par bya //
translated: The ultimate in the highest sense.

original: yod pa'i mtha' dang med pa'i mtha' //
analyzed: yod pa'i mtha' dang med pa'i mtha' //
translated: The extremes of existence and nonexistence

original: gnyis po thams cad spangs pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis po thams cad spangs pa ste //
translated: Are both completely abandoned.

original: de lta bu ni don dam mo //üîΩkun @330a * //
analyzed: de lta bu ni don dam mo // kun @330a * //
translated: Such is the ultimate.

original: rdzob ji ltar snang ba yin //
analyzed: rdzob ji ltar snang ba yin //
translated: The relative is whatever appears.

original: de yang gnyis su shes bya ste //
analyzed: de yang gnyis su shes bya ste //
translated: It should be understood to be twofold:üîΩThe relative of error

original: log pa yi ni kun rdzob dang // yang dag pa yi kun rdzob po //
analyzed: log pa yi ni kun rdzob dang // yang dag pa yi kun rdzob po //
translated: And the correct relative.

original: don byed nus pa'i dngos po ni //
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i dngos po ni //
translated: Things that are able to perform a function

original: yang dag kun rdzob ces bya ste //
analyzed: yang dag kun rdzob ces bya ste //
translated: Are called ‚Äúcorrect relative truth.‚Äù

original: snang yang don byed mi nus pa //
analyzed: snang yang don byed mi nus pa //
translated: And though appearing, are unable to perform a function,

original: log pa yi ni kun rdzob po //
analyzed: log pa yi ni kun rdzob po //
translated: Are the unreal conventional.

original: de yang gnyis su shes bya ste //
analyzed: de yang gnyis su shes bya ste //
translated: And that should be understood as twofold:

original: rtog bcas dang ni rtog med gnyis //
analyzed: rtog bcas dang ni rtog med gnyis //
translated: Conceptual and nonconceptual.

original: rtog bcas thag pa la sprul 'dzin //
analyzed: rtog bcas thag pa la sprul 'dzin //
translated: The conceptual is, for example, apprehending a rope to be a snake.

original: rtog med zla ba gnyis 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rtog med zla ba gnyis 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The nonconceptual is, for example, apprehending two moons.üîΩTherefore, everything is subsumed

original: des na thams cad bden gnyis su //üîΩ'dus pa nyid du bstan par bya //
analyzed: des na thams cad bden gnyis su // 'dus pa nyid du bstan par bya //
translated: Within the two truths.

original: de don nyams su blangs nas ni //
analyzed: de don nyams su blangs nas ni //
translated: Having practiced the meaning of that,

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob //
translated: One will attain all excellence.

original: dbu ma yi ni don bsdus pa //
analyzed: dbu ma yi ni don bsdus pa //
translated: This is the summary of the meaning of the middle way.

original: de ltar bdag gis bshad pa yi //
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis bshad pa yi //
translated: Thus, I have explained

original: dge ba bdag gis bsags pa yi //
analyzed: dge ba bdag gis bsags pa yi //
translated: The virtue I have accumulated.

original: dge ba gang des sems can gyi //üîΩbsam pa myur du 'grub gyur cig / dbu ma don bsdus pa slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dge ba gang des sems can gyi // bsam pa myur du 'grub gyur cig / dbu ma don bsdus pa slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: By that virtue,üîΩMay the wishes of sentient beings be quickly fulfilled.üîΩThis completes the Compendium of the Middle Way composed by the master BhƒÅviveka.
